infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Mari Gunting needs your location to find nearby barbers, calculate accurate travel costs, and provide the best service experience.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Mari Gunting needs your location to track barber arrival and provide real-time updates.
